org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions

Class ImmutableReference<IMMUTABLE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions.ImmutableReference<IMMUTABLE>
  • Type Parameters:
    IMMUTABLE - The type of immutable to be operated on.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blade, IsolationBlade, ImmutableSource<IMMUTABLE>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ISMReference

    public class ImmutableReference<IMMUTABLE>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IsolationBlade, ImmutableSource<IMMUTABLE>
    An IsolationBlade to which transactions can be applied.
